faq_handling.title: Por que meu pedido está parado em “Preparando entrega”?
faq_handling.description: Preparando Entrega é um status do fluxo de pedidos em que se espera o cadastro da nota fiscal para a fatura.
faq_product_visible.title: Por que o produto não aparece no site?
faq_product_visible.description: Para um produto aparecer disponível na loja ele precisa ser atendido pela logística configurada na loja.
faq_carrier.title: Por que minha transportadora não aparece no checkout?
faq_carrier.description: Separamos cinco cenários em que esse comportamento ocorre e suas respectivas soluções.

api_reference_page.title: API Reference

start_here_page.title: Comece aqui
start_here_page.subtitle: Aprenda, passo a passo, tudo que precisa saber para começar a usar a VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.title: Marketplace
start_here_page_marketplace.content.0.de: Venda seus produtos em um dos maiores varejistas do mundo através da integração nativa da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.1.de: Venda seus produtos em um dos maiores marketplaces da América Latina através da integração nativa da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.2.de: Venda seus produtos em um dos maiores marketplaces do Brasil através da integração nativa da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.3.de: Venda em um dos mercados mais tradicionais do mundo através da integração da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.4.de: Venda seus produtos na maior rede de lojas esportivas da América Latina com a integração nativa da VTEX!
start_here_page_marketplace.content.5.ti: Integração com o Facebook Business Extension
start_here_page_marketplace.content.5.de: Anuncie seus produtos pela plataforma Facebook Business Extension através da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.6.de: Venda seus produtos em um dos maiores marketplaces do Brasil, em sites como Submarino, Lojas Americanas e Shoptime, através da integração nativa da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.7.de: Venda seus produtos em lojas como Casas Bahia e Ponto Frio, marketplaces referência de móveis e eletrodomésticos do Brasil através da integração nativa da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.8.de: Venda seus produtos em um dos maiores marketplaces de moda através da integração nativa da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.9.de: Venda seus produtos em um dos maiores marketplaces de artigos esportivos através da integração nativa da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.10.d: Venda seus produtos na Wish usando nossa integração nativa.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.11.d: Anuncie seus produtos na plataforma de listagem e rastreamento de produtos do Google através da integração nativa da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.12.t: Como fazer campanhas através do Google Shopping Ads?
start_here_page_marketplace.content.12.d: Anuncie no Google Shopping Ads usando o mais novo recurso do Google, as Campanhas Inteligentes. Comece a anunciar em minutos usando seu catálogo de produtos.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.13.d: Venda seus produtos em uma das maiores redes sociais do mundo através da integração nativa da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.14.d: Anuncie seus produtos no TikTok através da VTEX.
start_here_page_marketplace.content.15.d: Venda seus produtos na plataforma de marketplace com o maior programa de recompensas do Brasil.

start_here_page_modules.content.10.descr: Aprenda os fundamentos de desenvolvimento de loja na VTEX.
start_here_page_omnichannel.title: Omnichannel
start_here_page_omnichannel.content.0.ti: VTEX Sales App - Primeiros passos e configurações
start_here_page_omnichannel.content.0.de: Conceitos, pré-requisitos e instruções para configurar o VTEX Sales App.
start_here_page_omnichannel.content.1.de: O passo a passo para configurar os métodos de pagamento por adquirente homologado.
start_here_page_omnichannel.content.2.ti: VTEX Sales App - Usando o app
start_here_page_omnichannel.content.2.de: As funcionalidades do aplicativo do VTEX Sales App e como usá-las.
start_here_page_omnichannel.content.3.de: Guias com o passo a passo para implementar algumas das principais estratégias de Comércio Unificado na VTEX.
start_here_page_vtex_io.title: VTEX IO
start_here_page_vtex_io.content.0.title: VTEX Intelligent Search
start_here_page_vtex_io.content.0.descri: Aprenda os fundamentos do aplicativo VTEX Intelligent Search
start_here_page_vtex_io.content.1.title: Hub de Extensões
start_here_page_vtex_io.content.1.descri: Adquira e gerencie extensões para estender a funcionalidade da sua loja. Encontre parceiros para desenvolver soluções personalizadas.
start_here_page_erp.title: ERP
start_here_page_erp.content.0.title: Adaptador VTEX - CIASHOP
start_here_page_erp.content.0.descriptio: Aprenda os fundamentos do Adaptador para migrar a integração entre seu ERP e a CIASHOP para a VTEX.
start_here_page_payment.title: Soluções de pagamento
start_here_page_payment.content.0.title: Customer Credit - Como Começar
start_here_page_payment.content.0.descri: Habilite uma nova forma de pagamento para a sua loja ao aprender o passo a passo de como instalar e configurar o Customer Credit.
start_here_page_payment.content.1.title: Condições de Pagamento Clusterizadas
start_here_page_payment.content.1.descri: Conheça e habilite a nova customização de pagamento para o Customer Credit.
start_here_page_payment.content.2.title: Carteira digital (ewallet)
start_here_page_payment.content.2.descri: Uma carteira digital (também chamada de ewallet) é um ambiente seguro onde podem ser armazenados dados bancários e de cartão de crédito.
start_here_page_conversational.title: Conversational Commerce
start_here_page_conversational.content.0: Aprenda a diversificar canais de venda, com compras mais rápidas e mais personalizadas por meio da automação.
start_here_page_conversational.content.1: Aprenda soluções para atrair mais clientes, organizar os atendimentos do seu time, capturar dados dos clientes, fechar vendas e mensurar resultados.
storefront_development_page.title: Storefront Development
storefront_development_page.subtitle: Express your brand identity creating unique storefronts.
vtex_io_apps_page.title: VTEX IO Apps
vtex_io_apps_page.subtitle: Find pre-built solutions to grow your business.
app_development_page.title: App Development
app_development_page.subtitle: Learn how to develop apps and integrations in the cloud with VTEX IO.
app_development_page_new_to_app_developm: Build stores and IO apps from scratch with our learning-oriented tutorials.
app_development_page_solve_real_world_is: Achieve specific ends by following our goal-oriented step by step guides.
app_development_page_build_foundations.d: Understand core aspects of the VTEX IO platform with our reference docs.
app_development_page_go_further.title: Go further
app_development_page_go_further.descript: Publish your app on the VTEX App Store and explore our recommended practices.
app_development_page_other_resources_com: The VTEX Community is an ecosystem where our clients and partners can interact, ask questions, and exchange information among themselves. It's the go-to place to find answers and talk about VTEX products.
app_development_page_other_resources_lea: The Learning Center contains courses about specific aspects of the IO platform and Store Framework.
app_development_page_other_resources_git: VTEX IO open-source apps and documentation are fully stored in the VTEX Apps Organization on GitHub.
app_development_page_other_resources_hel: The Help Center contains beginner tutorials, reference guides and troubleshooting articles about the VTEX Admin panel.
app_development_page_other_resources_sup: All clients have access to the services provided by our Technical Support team. These specialists are extensively prepared to give you the best experience possible when solving your tickets. To contact them, you need to open a ticket to VTEX support.

faq_filter.title: Produtos
sitemap_page.title: Mapa do site
landing_subtitle_3: for users of words at VTEX
guides_card_subtitle: Explore VTEX core principles that shape language choices in content creation
user_interfaces_card_subtitle: Write strings for VTEX interface elements that are consistent and enhance usability
documentation_card_subtitle: Write help articles and developer guides that communicate VTEX knowledge effectively
grammar_card_subtitle: Learn about VTEX grammatical standards that inform all types of content
formatting_card_subtitle: Essential formatting rules for all types of content
glossary_card_subtitle: Apply terms that are already being used on VTEX and translate them consistently
glossaries_card_subtitle: Enhance the user experience by using the most updated and researched VTEX terms in English, Portuguese and Spanish.
faststore_card_subtitle: Deliver blazing-fast stores that convert with an open-source toolkit for storefront experiences
brand_card_subtitle: Bring the VTEX brand to life with a collection of graphic and conceptual codes that should be used consistently
developer_portal_card_subtitle: Implement storefronts and apps by leveraging the VTEX architecture and commerce APIs
help_center_card_subtitle: Answer questions and learn about new features by exploring the VTEX knowledge base
style_guides_page_education.title: Education
style_guides_page_education.content.0.de: Empower users in their journey through the VTEX platform with clear and thorough documentation. Learn how to structure and format all the elements of Help Center articles and how to document APIs through the OpenAPI Specification.
guides_page_section.title: Guides
guides_page_section.content.0.title: Tone of voice
guides_page_section.content.0.descriptio: Tone of voice ensures consistency in VTEX communication. It defines personality and style across all content, from UI elements to documentation.
guides_page_section.content.2.title: Product and feature naming
guides_page_section.content.2.descriptio: Product and feature names should be clear, concise, and aligned with the VTEX identity. They help users quickly understand what a product or feature does.
guides_page_section.content.3.title: US English standard
guides_page_section.content.3.descriptio: Learn about US spelling patterns for writing VTEX content.
guides_page_section.content.4.title: Inclusive language
guides_page_section.content.4.descriptio: Learn how to use language that reflects diversity and promotes respectful, inclusive communication across all VTEX content
user_interfaces_page_section.title: Interface copy
user_interfaces_page_section.content.0.d: Action labels use up to three words to describe an action the user needs or wants to perform. This pattern is commonly seen in components such as Buttons and Menus.
user_interfaces_page_section.content.2.d: Content labels consist of up to three words to identify data properties and values. This pattern is typically found in components like Inputs, Tables, and Forms.
user_interfaces_page_section.content.3.d: Descriptions use a single sentence to clarify or explain complex information or tasks to the user.
user_interfaces_page_section.content.4.d: Messages consist of up to two sentences to communicate the system's current state and provide feedback on user actions. This pattern is commonly found in components such as Inputs or Alerts.
user_interfaces_page_section.content.5.d: Placeholder texts provide temporary guidance inside input fields. They should be concise and instructional and disappear when the user types.
user_interfaces_page_section.content.7.d: Titles should be concise and descriptive, following capitalization and formatting guidelines to ensure consistency across documentation and UI.
user_interfaces_page_section.content.8.d: Reference guide for applying consistent data formatting across VTEX content, including conventions for time, date, currency, and regional codes.
documentation_page_section_general.title: Documentation guidelines
documentation_page_section_general.conte: Learn how VTEX creates documentation and follow best practices to create clear, concise, and user-friendly content.
Explore ways to contribute to VTEX’s public documentation and help improve its quality and accessibility.
documentation_page_section_templates.con: Use this template to introduce new users to a specific technology, tool, or system.
Use this template to provide practical solutions to common problems users may encounter while using the platform.
Use this template to guide users through, including installation, configuration, and usage.
Use this template to inform users about updates, enhancements, and bug fixes in a new product version.
Use this template to deliver clear, specific instructions for completing a task or achieving a goal.
Use this template to provide step-by-step guidance on performing tasks or understanding complex concepts in detail.
Use this template to inform users about new features, improvements, bug fixes, and other product and system updates.
Learn about the purpose of Known Issue articles, how they differ from other documentation types, and see an overview of a Known Issue article.
formatting_page_section.title: Formatting
formatting_page_section.content.0.title: Headings and titles
formatting_page_section.content.0.descri: Headings and titles name the content of an article and sections within it.
formatting_page_section.content.1.title: Lists and tables
formatting_page_section.content.1.descri: Lists and tables organize structured content, making it easier for users to scan and understand.
grammar_page_section.title: Grammar
grammar_page_section.content.0.title: Articles
grammar_page_section.content.0.descripti: Articles should be used to improve readability and clarity. They should be omitted in certain UI elements for brevity.
grammar_page_section.content.2.title: Capitalization
grammar_page_section.content.2.descripti: Capitalization rules define when and how to capitalize words for clarity and consistency. This applies to UI elements, titles, and technical documentation.
grammar_page_section.content.3.title: Abbreviations
grammar_page_section.content.3.descripti: Appropriately used abbreviations help keep content concise.
grammar_page_section.content.4.title: Verbs
grammar_page_section.content.4.descripti: Verbs should be action-oriented and clear, guiding users through processes or instructions. They play a key role in UI text, documentation, and help content.
grammar_page_section.content.5.title: Pronouns
grammar_page_section.content.5.descripti: Pronouns should be used in a way that maintains clarity and inclusivity. They help make content more conversational and user-friendly.
grammar_page_section.content.6.title: Adjectives
grammar_page_section.content.6.descripti: Use adjectives only when necessary to accurately describe products, features, or actions. Clear and precise descriptions make the text easier to read.
grammar_page_section.content.7.title: Contractions
grammar_page_section.content.7.descripti: Contractions should be used carefully to maintain clarity and flow in the text. They can make the content sound more natural and approachable.
grammar_page_section.content.8.title: Punctuation
grammar_page_section.content.8.descripti: Punctuation should be used consistently to clarify UI elements, documentation, and system messages. Proper punctuation enhances readability and avoids confusion.
glossary_page_section.title: Glossary →
glossary_page_section.content.0.title: Example file
changelog_page_section.title: Changelog
changelog_page_section.content.0.title: Example file
